name: objectinit
description: A simple macro to make initialising objects much easier: `new User().init({ name:'Jason', age:27, likes:['haxe','macros'] })`.  It's type safe!
releasenote: Add `objectInit()` and `initObject()` aliases. Fix for PHP. Allow `new Project().init([ name, downloads, tags ])` syntax when local variables share the same name as the target properties.
